purpose: To enable developers to easily create and integrate large language model (LLM) tools and agents using familiar programming languages.
principle: Leverages plain Bash, JavaScript, and Python functions to define and execute LLM-based tools and agents, making it accessible to developers familiar with these languages.
reusability: Offers a straightforward method for developers to incorporate LLM capabilities into their projects using existing function definitions.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may mean limited functionality and potential stability issues.
name: llm-functions
description: Easily create LLM tools and agents using plain Bash/JavaScript/Python functions.
highlight: Facilitates the creation of LLM tools and agents using simple Bash/JavaScript/Python functions.
